subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets and the Phillies played into extra innings for the third time in three days, with Lucas Duda finally deciding the game in the 11th with a two-run homer in his first at-bat.
snippet: The Mets and the Phillies played into extra innings for the third time in three days, with Lucas Duda finally deciding the game in the 11th with a two-run homer in his first at-bat.
